name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reaction gifs and memes for facebook chat

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reaction gifs and memes plugin for your facebook chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your favouritre reaction gifs and good old fashioned meme faces for your facebook chat window

*********************************

Just type a slash [/] followed by the secret code.

EXAMPLE:

/megusta
/yes1
/facepalm

*********************************

Remember,  only people who have the plugin installed can see GIFs in chat.
				
INFORMATION and GIF & MEME CODE LIST
http://4gifme.com/facebook-gifs/
